crisis_hotlines.name: Tele MANAS Helpline
crisis_hotlines.description: A 24/7 free national mental health helpline by the Government of India, available in 20 regional languages.

crisis_hotlines.name: MPower Minds Helpline
crisis_hotlines.description: A 24/7 helpline by the Aditya Birla Education Trust providing mental health support across India.

crisis_hotlines.name: Vandrevala Foundation for Mental Health
crisis_hotlines.description: 24/7 crisis hotline for anyone feeling distressed or suicidal.

crisis_hotlines.name: iCALL Psychosocial Helpline
crisis_hotlines.description: Available from Monday to Saturday, 10 AM to 8 PM. Provides counseling by telephone.

online_counseling.name: YourDOST
online_counseling.description: An online platform connecting you with professional counselors and psychologists for chat, phone, or video sessions. They often have resources for students.

online_counseling.name: Manastha
online_counseling.description: Offers online therapy and counseling services with a focus on affordability and accessibility for young people in India.

youth_communities.name: Sangath - Adolescent and Youth Mental Health
youth_communities.description: An organization dedicated to youth mental health, offering evidence-based interventions, support, and resources for young people in India.

youth_communities.name: SCARF India - Youth Mental Health Program
youth_communities.description: The Schizophrenia Research Foundation (SCARF) runs a dedicated program to address the mental health needs of young people, offering support and awareness.

youth_communities.name: The Alternative Story
youth_communities.description: A platform offering affordable therapy, support groups, and workshops, with a focus on creating safe spaces for young adults.

youth_communities.name: LonePack
youth_communities.description: A youth-led mental health organization that runs a peer support network and works to destigmatize conversations around mental health in India.
